reasoning: The application shows an error dialog claiming 'Another user has taken action' in a single-user scenario, and the Publish operation completely fails even after page refresh. This indicates a genuine state management bug in the workflow/versioning system, likely triggered by the auto-save feature conflicting with the publish operation.
evidence_summary: Screenshots clearly show an Error dialog appearing when clicking Publish, stating 'Another user has taken action on the page' despite being a single-user test. The error persists after refreshing and retrying. The Publish button exists in the UI but produces this erroneous conflict error, preventing content publication.
